title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and immersion dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave
description: A narrow strip patterned with a variety of stylized flowers on a curving stem on a purple background.  The blossoms are in two shades of red, purple, blue and green (over-painting of yellow on blue). Possibly a fragment of an all-over patterned fabric.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and immersion dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave. 1969-62-3.
